poem.author: Peter McCarey etc.
poem.text:
Good King Wenceslas looked out
On the feast of Steven
When the snowly roundabout
Deep and crisp and odd.
An odd and an odd is an even;
An odd and an even's an odd.
Paranoid his prosody
Never checked his spelling.
Yonder peasant Squoo is he,
Square and squat his dwelling.
